nodes.text: A ship was owned by General Leia Organa, leader of the Resistance.

Leia Organa's starship featured a gold-colored hull and bore resemblence to the Naboo Royal Starship, a chromium-plated modified J-type 327 Nubian starship. The ship featured a sparsely decorated interior, including a spacious cargo hold and an airlock above the engines, which were located beneath the craft's main body.

As part of the Resistance's efforts to retrieve Lor San Tekka from prison on Cato Neimoidia, Leia Organa and Suralinda Javos traveled on the ship to the palace of Baron Reya under the guise that Organa wanted to place gowns owned by her mother, Padmé Amidala, in the secure vaults of Reya's palace. The ship was later stolen by First Order officer Terex with the rescued Tekka onboard.
Leia Organa's ship first appeared in the 2017 comic issue Poe Dameron 21, written by Charles Soule with illustration by Angel Unzueta.
